name: Ghost Game (Florin Pain)
description:
A game like never before. Starting as a ghost, you can get inside any NPC and controll their body and actions. Swap from NPC to NPC and spread the madness: make them fight each other, make them run. You can be anyone you want! But beware, the priest is coming to banish you.

This game contains many great features, for example: advanced hand made AI, visual pathfinding for objectives, first person combined with third person, every NPC can be controlled by player, etc

Free for a limited period of time. Get it now!

Your donations are much appreciated
